name: RattledDaphnia's Rat Maze
description:
Note: This is my entry for the Bitsy Game Monthly Jam for the theme of "Rat".

Description

I admit the game's just a software toy and not really a full-fledged game. You run around a maze as a rat trying to outrun a perpetually chasing cat. If you accidentally run into the caught, the games over and you lose. Have fun.

Controls

Use ASWD or the arrow keys to move.

Credits

Image from https://free-images.com/

Image Effect created with Bitsy to Image.

Layout created with Maze Generator: http://www.mazegenerator.net/

Palette made with palettesy

End from Dialogue and Follower hacks used.
